00156 template<class V,class T,class A>
00157 SPtr<Node> Visual<V,T,A>::clone() {
00158 
00159     SPtr<Node> clone(new Visual<V,T,A>(this->name));
00160     clone.smart_static_cast(SPtr<Visual<V,T,A> >())->localTransform->setTo(*(this->localTransform));
00161     clone.smart_static_cast(SPtr<Visual<V,T,A> >())->localAppearance->setTo(*localAppearance);
00162 
00163     if(this->bounds.get()) {
00164         SPtr<BoundingVolume<V> > boundsClone(this->bounds->clone());
00165         clone.smart_static_cast(SPtr<Visual<V,T,A> >())->setBounds(boundsClone);
00166     }
00167 
00168     return clone;
00169 }

00172 template<class V,class T,class A>
00173 SPtr<Node> Visual<V,T,A>::cloneTree(SPtr<Node>& parent) {
00174 
00175     SPtr<Node> clone(this->clone());
00176 
00177     //reparent clone
00178     if(parent.get()) {
00179         parent->attachChild(clone);
00180     }
00181 
00182     //recursively clone children
00183     for(int i=0; i<this->children->size(); i++) {
00184         this->children->get(i)->cloneTree(clone);
00185     }
00186 
00187     return clone;
00188 }
